fn.p: The editorial leadership of eLife has identified four particularly outstanding Research Articles that were published in the journal before the end of May 2013, and one early career author from each article has been invited to give a presentation at a meeting organized by one of the agencies that sponsor eLife. Another four authors will be invited to give presentations early next year.
